title: Audit and document segment definition sources across CRM and Customer_Analyzer

sections.text: Investigate how segment membership is computed in CRM vs Customer_Analyzer and identify where definitions can drift (fields, filters, refresh cadence, ownership). Produce a concise mapping of segment names to their underlying criteria and data sources, highlighting mismatches and the specific impact-reporting surfaces in Issue_Tracker affected. Output should include recommended “source of truth” per segment and any gaps that require follow-up fixes in subsequent tickets.
